string-array.name: java_code
xml_code
string-array.item:
<LinearLayout 
 xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" 
xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" 
android:layout_width="match_parent" 
android:layout_height="match_parent" 
android:orientation="vertical" 
android:gravity="center_horizontal|center_vertical" 
 
 tools:context=".ui.fragments.resultFragments.EditTextFragment"> 
<TextView 
android:id="@+id/tv_name" 
android:layout_width="wrap_content" 
android:layout_height="wrap_content" 
android:layout_margin="16dp" 
 android:textColor="@color/black" 
 android:textSize="24sp" /> 
 
<EditText 
android:id="@+id/editText" 
android:layout_width="match_parent" 
android:layout_height="wrap_content" 
android:layout_margin="8dp" 
android:hint="Hi type your name and press ok !" 
android:minHeight="48dp" /> 
 
<Button 
android:id="@+id/btn_click" 
android:layout_width="wrap_content" 
android:layout_height="wrap_content" 
android:layout_margin="16dp" 
android:textAllCaps="false" 
android:text="Click me !" /> 
 
</LinearLayout>

// activity_main.xml 
 \<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
 xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" 
 xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" 
 android:layout_width="match_parent" 
 android:layout_height="match_parent" 
 android:orientation="vertical" 
 android:gravity="center" 
 tools:context=".ui.fragments.resultFragments.IntentFragment"\> 
 
 \<Button 
 android:id="@+id/btn_other_activity" 
 android:layout_width="wrap_content" 
 android:layout_height="wrap_content" 
 android:text="Go to another activity"\> 
 \</Button\> 
 \</LinearLayout\> 
 

// new_activity.xml 
 \<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
 xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
 xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="match_parent"
 android:gravity="center"
 android:orientation="vertical" 
 tools:context=".ui.fragments.resultFragments.IntentOtherFragment"\> 

 \<TextView
 android:layout_width="wrap_content"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:text="Welcome to the other activity"
 /\>
 \</LinearLayout\>

// activity_main.xml 
 
 \<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="
 http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
 xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
 xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools "
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="match_parent"
 tools:context=".ui.fragments.resultFragments.IntentPassDataFragment"\>


\<LinearLayout
 android:id="@+id/linear_layout_pass_data"
 android:layout_width="wrap_content"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:orientation="vertical"
 app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
 app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
 app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
 app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"\>


\<TextView 
 android:layout_width="wrap_content"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:text="Please fill your information"
 android:layout_marginBottom="10dp" /\>


\<TextView
 android:id="@+id/tv_name"
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:layout_marginBottom="10dp"
 android:text="Full name" /\>


\<EditText
 android:id="@+id/ed_name"
no android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:hint="Your name"
 android:layout_marginBottom="20dp"
 android:inputType="textPersonName" /\>


\<TextView
 android:id="@+id/tv_age"
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:textSize="20sp"
 android:layout_marginBottom="10dp"
 android:text="Age" /\>


\<EditText
 android:id="@+id/ed_age"
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:hint="Age"
 android:inputType="textPersonName" /\>


\<Button
 android:id="@+id/btn_change_activity"
 android:layout_width="wrap_content"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:layout_gravity="center"
 android:text="Change activity" />
 \</LinearLayout\>


\</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout\>


//new_activity.xml
 \<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
 xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
 xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="match_parent"
 android:gravity="center"
 tools:context=".ui.fragments.resultFragments.IntentPassDataOtherFragment"\>
 

\<TextView
 android:id="@+id/tv_data_received"
 android:layout_width="wrap_content"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:text="Hello"
 android:textColor="@color/black"
 android:textSize="24sp" /\>


\</LinearLayout\>

\<LinearLayout 
 android:layout_width="match_parent" 
 android:layout_height="match_parent"
 android:orientation="vertical"
 android:gravity="center" \>


\<TextView
 android:text="Hello, there you can put your url" /\>

\<EditText
 android:id="@+id/ed_url"
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:hint="URL" /\>


\<Button
 android:id="@+id/btn_go_to_url"
 android:layout_width="wrap_content"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:text="Go to URl" /\>

\</LinearLayout\>

\<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
 xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="match_parent"
 tools:context=".ui.fragments.resultFragments.IntentEmailFragment"\>


\<LinearLayout
 	 android:id="@+id/linear_layout_email"
 	 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 	 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 	 android:orientation="vertical"
 	 app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
 	 app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
 	 app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
 	 app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
 	 android:padding="15dp" \>


\<TextView
 android:id="@+id/tv_please_fill"
 android:layout_width="wrap_content"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:layout_marginTop="4dp"
 android:text="@string/hello_blank_fragment"
 android:textColor="@color/black"
 android:textSize="24sp" /\>


\<TextView
 android:id="@+id/tv_email_destination"
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:layout_marginTop="15dp"
 android:text="Email destination"
 android:textColor="@color/black"
 android:textSize="20sp" /\>


\<EditText
 android:id="@+id/ed_email_destination"
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:layout_marginTop="10dp"
 android:ems="10"
 android:hint="Destination email"
 android:inputType="textEmailAddress"/\>


\<TextView
 android:id="@+id/tv_subject"
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:layout_marginTop="15dp"
 android:textColor="@color/black"
 android:text="Subject"
 android:textSize="20sp" /\>


\<EditText
 android:id="@+id/ed_subject"
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:layout_marginTop="10dp"
 android:ems="10"
 android:hint="Subject"
 android:inputType="textPersonName"/\>


\<TextView\ android:id="@+id/tv_content"
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:layout_marginTop="15dp"
 android:text="Email content" /\>


\<EditText
 android:id="@+id/ed_content"
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:layout_marginTop="10dp"
 android:ems="10"
 android:hint="Write your email there"
 android:inputType="textMultiLine"/>


\<Button
 android:id="@+id/btn_send_email"
 android:layout_width="wrap_content"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:layout_gravity="center"
 android:layout_marginTop="25dp"
 android:text="Send email" /\>

 \</LinearLayout\>
\</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout\>

// res/menu/action_menu.xml 
 \<menu xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"\>

 \<item
 android:id="@+id/action_blue"
 android:title="Blue" /\>
 \<item
 android:id="@+id/action_red"
 android:title="Red" /\>
 \<item
 android:id="@+id/action_green"
 android:title="Green" /\>


\</menu\>

 //activity_main.xml 
 \<FrameLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
 xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
 android:id="@+id/menu_background"
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="match_parent"


\</FrameLayout\>

// activity_main.xml
 \<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
 xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="match_parent"
 android:gravity="center"\>


\<Button
 android:id="@+id/btn_popup"
 android:layout_width="wrap_content"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:text="Click me!" 
 â€¦/\>


\</LinearLayout\>

 //popup_menu.xml
 \<menu xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"\>
 \<item
 android:id="@+id/option1"
 android:title="Option1"/\>
 \<item
 android:id="@+id/option2"
 android:title="Option2"/\>
 \<item
 android:id="@+id/option3"
 android:title="Option3"/\>
 \</menu\>

//activity_main.xml
 \<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
 xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="match_parent"
 android:orientation="vertical"
 android:padding="15dp"\>


\<TextView
 android:id="@+id/tv_long_press"
 android:text="Please long press in the item" /\>


\<Button
 android:id="@+id/btn1_context"
 android:text="First button" /\>


\<Button
 android:id="@+id/btn2"
 android:text="Second button" /\>


\<Button
 android:id="@+id/btn3"
 android:text="Third button" /\>
 \</LinearLayout\>

 // context_menu.xml 
 \<menu xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"\>
 \<item
 android:id="@+id/delete"
 android:title="Delete"/\>
 \<item
 android:id="@+id/add_new"
 android:title="Add"/\>
 \<item
 android:id="@+id/move_to"
 android:title="Move to"/\>
 \</menu\>

//activity_main.xml
 \<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
 xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="match_parent"
 android:gravity="center"
 tools:context=".ui.fragments.resultFragments.AlertDialogFragment"\>

 \<TextView
â€¦
 android:text="Enter your name"/\>


\<EditText
 android:id="@+id/ed_name_alert_dialog"
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:hint="Name"/\>

 \<Button
 android:id="@+id/btn_click_me"
 android:layout_width="wrap_content"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:text="Click me!"
 /\>
 \</LinearLayout\>

// activity_main.xml 
 
 <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout 
 xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" 
 xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" 
 xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" 
 android:id="@+id/frameLayout" 
 android:layout_width="match_parent" 
 android:layout_height="match_parent" 
 
 tools:context=".ui.fragments.resultFragments.SQLiteFragment"> 
 <TextView 
 android:id="@+id/tv_my_notes" 
 android:layout_width="wrap_content" 
 android:layout_height="36dp" 
 android:text="My notes " 
 android:fontFamily="@font/poppins" 
 android:textColor="@color/black" 
 android:textSize="24sp" 
 android:textStyle="bold" 
 android:layout_marginStart="20dp" 
 android:layout_marginTop="20dp" 
 app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" 
 app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" /> 
 

<com.google.android.material.floatingactionbutton.FloatingActionButton 
 android:id="@+id/floatingActionButton" 
 android:layout_width="wrap_content" 
 android:layout_height="wrap_content" 
 android:layout_marginEnd="32dp" 
 android:layout_marginBottom="32dp" 
 android:clickable="true" 
 android:src="@drawable/ic_add" 
 app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" 
 app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" 
 tools:ignore="SpeakableTextPresentCheck" /> 
 

<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView 
 android:id="@+id/rv_notes" 
 android:layout_width="match_parent" 
 android:layout_height="0dp" 
 android:layout_marginTop="16dp" 
 app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" 
 app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" 
 app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" 
 app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/tv_my_notes" /> 
 </androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout> 
 

\ note_rv_item.xml 
 
 <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout 
 xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" 
 android:layout_width="match_parent" 
 android:layout_height="wrap_content" 
 android:layout_margin="8dp" 
 xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"> 
 

<androidx.cardview.widget.CardView 
 android:layout_width="match_parent" 
 android:layout_height="wrap_content" 
 android:background="@color/beige" 
 app:cardCornerRadius="30dp" 
 app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" 
 app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" 
 app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" 
 app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"> 
 

<RelativeLayout 
 android:layout_width="match_parent" 
 android:layout_height="match_parent" 
 android:background="@color/light_blue" 
 android:padding="32dp" 
 > 
 
 <TextView 
 android:id="@+id/tv_note_content" 
 android:layout_width="wrap_content" 
 android:layout_height="wrap_content" 
 android:text="Helllo" 
 android:layout_margin="16dp" 
 android:layout_alignParentStart="true" 
 android:fontFamily="@font/poppins" 
 android:textColor="@color/black" 
 android:textSize="18sp" /> 
 

<ImageView 
 android:id="@+id/iv_delete" 
 android:layout_width="wrap_content" 
 android:layout_height="wrap_content" 
 android:layout_gravity="end" 
 android:layout_margin="4dp" 
 android:layout_alignParentEnd="true" 
 app:srcCompat="@drawable/ic_delete" /> 
 

</RelativeLayout> 

</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView> 

</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout> 
 

\ add_note_dialog.xml 
 
 <LinearLayout 
 xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" 
 android:layout_width="wrap_content" 
 android:layout_height="wrap_content" 
 android:gravity="center" 
 android:padding="8dp" 
 android:orientation="vertical"> 
 

<EditText 
 android:id="@+id/et_note" 
 android:layout_width="300dp" 
 android:layout_height="wrap_content" 
 android:ems="10" 
 android:padding="8dp" 
 android:hint="Add note here" 
 android:inputType="textPersonName"/> 
 

</LinearLayout>

<LinearLayout 
 xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" 
 xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" 
 android:layout_width="match_parent" 
 android:layout_height="match_parent" 
 android:gravity="center" 
 android:orientation="vertical" 
 
 tools:context=".ui.fragments.resultFragments.ViewModelFragment"> 
 

<TextView 
 android:id="@+id/textView" 
 android:layout_width="wrap_content" 
 android:layout_height="wrap_content" 
 android:textSize="24sp" 
 android:textColor="@color/black" 
 android:layout_margin="8dp" 
 android:textStyle="bold"- 
 android:text="Score " /> 
 

<TextView 
 android:id="@+id/tv_score" 
 android:layout_width="wrap_content" 
 android:layout_height="wrap_content" 
 android:textSize="24sp" 
 android:textColor="@color/black" /> 
 

<Button 
 android:id="@+id/btn_increment" 
 android:layout_width="wrap_content" 
 android:layout_height="wrap_content" 
 android:layout_margin="16dp" 
 android:textAllCaps="false" 
 android:text="Increment" /> 
 </LinearLayout>
